00068 /* Data types */                /*                      min      max    */
00069 
00070 #define TID_BYTE      1         /* unsigned byte         0       255    */
00071 #define TID_SBYTE     2         /* signed byte         -128      127    */
00072 #define TID_CHAR      3         /* single character      0       255    */
00073 #define TID_WORD      4         /* two bytes             0      65535   */
00074 #define TID_SHORT     5         /* signed word        -32768    32767   */
00075 #define TID_DWORD     6         /* four bytes            0      2^32-1  */
00076 #define TID_INT       7         /* signed dword        -2^31    2^31-1  */
00077 #define TID_BOOL      8         /* four bytes bool       0        1     */
00078 #define TID_FLOAT     9         /* 4 Byte float format                  */
00079 #define TID_DOUBLE   10         /* 8 Byte float format                  */
00080 #define TID_BITFIELD 11         /* 32 Bits Bitfield      0  111... (32) */
00081 #define TID_STRING   12         /* zero terminated string               */
00082 #define TID_ARRAY    13         /* array with unknown contents          */
00083 #define TID_STRUCT   14         /* structure with fixed length          */
00084 #define TID_KEY      15         /* key in online database               */
00085 #define TID_LINK     16         /* link in online database              */
00086 #define TID_LAST     17         /* end of TID list indicator            */
00087 
00088 #define CBYTE(_i)        (* ((unsigned char *)   prpc_param[_i]))
00089 #define CPBYTE(_i)       (  ((unsigned char *)   prpc_param[_i]))
00090 
00091 #define CSHORT(_i)       (* ((short *)           prpc_param[_i]))
00092 #define CPSHORT(_i)      (  ((short *)           prpc_param[_i]))
00093 
00094 #define CINT(_i)         (* ((int *)             prpc_param[_i]))
00095 #define CPINT(_i)        (  ((int *)             prpc_param[_i]))
00096 
00097 #define CWORD(_i)        (* ((unsigned short *)  prpc_param[_i]))
00098 #define CPWORD(_i)       (  ((unsigned short *)  prpc_param[_i]))
00099 
00100 #define CLONG(_i)        (* ((long *)            prpc_param[_i]))
00101 #define CPLONG(_i)       (  ((long *)            prpc_param[_i]))
00102 
00103 #define CDWORD(_i)       (* ((unsigned int *)    prpc_param[_i]))
00104 #define CPDWORD(_i)      (  ((unsigned int *)    prpc_param[_i]))
00105 
00106 #define CBOOL(_i)        (* ((int *)             prpc_param[_i]))
00107 #define CPBOOL(_i)       (  ((int *)             prpc_param[_i]))
00108 
00109 #define CFLOAT(_i)       (* ((float *)           prpc_param[_i]))
00110 #define CPFLOAT(_i)      (  ((float *)           prpc_param[_i]))
00111 
00112 #define CDOUBLE(_i)      (* ((double *)          prpc_param[_i]))
00113 #define CPDOUBLE(_i)     (  ((double *)          prpc_param[_i]))
00114 
00115 #define CSTRING(_i)      (  ((char *)            prpc_param[_i]))
00116 #define CARRAY(_i)       (  ((void *)            prpc_param[_i]))
00117 
00118 /* flags */
00119 #define RPC_IN       (1 << 0)
00120 #define RPC_OUT      (1 << 1)
00121 #define RPC_POINTER  (1 << 2)
00122 #define RPC_FIXARRAY (1 << 3)
00123 #define RPC_VARARRAY (1 << 4)
00124 #define RPC_OUTGOING (1 << 5)
00125 
00126 /* rpc parameter list */
00127 
00128 typedef struct {
00129    unsigned short tid;
00130    unsigned short flags;
00131    int n;
00132 } RPC_PARAM;
00133 
00134 
00135 typedef struct {
00136    int id;
00137    char *name;
00138    RPC_PARAM param[20];
00139 } RPC_LIST;

00166 /* Network structures */
00167 
00168 typedef struct {
00169    int routine_id;              /* routine ID like ID_BM_xxx    */
00170    int param_size;              /* size in Bytes of parameter   */
00171 } NET_COMMAND_HEADER;
00172 
00173 typedef struct {
00174    NET_COMMAND_HEADER header;
00175    char param[32];              /* parameter array              */
00176 } NET_COMMAND;
00177 
00178 /* default listen port */
00179 #define MSCB_RPC_PORT           1176
00180 
00181 /* rpc timeout in milliseconds */
00182 #define RPC_TIMEOUT            10000

00184 /* RPC error codes */
00185 #define RPC_SUCCESS                1
00186 #define RPC_NET_ERROR              2
00187 #define RPC_INVALID_ID             3
00188 #define RPC_EXCEED_BUFFER          4
00189 #define RPC_ERR_TIMEOUT            5

00191 /* Align macro for data alignment on 8-byte boundary */
00192 #define ALIGN8(x)  (((x)+7) & ~7)
00193 
00194 /* maximal network packed size */
00195 #define NET_TCP_SIZE           65535
